divs: Sighting DetailsSince I know it is probably a good idea to at least report this, I am still unsure what this is, so I figure I would at least report it if it's anything. I can't recollect anything happening to me last night, but when I woke up this morning I has a bad sharp pain in my hand. It is seven hours later now and it still hurts. When I looked closely at my hand I could see a tiny triangle mark that is lighter than the rest of my hand and it is in the exact spot where the pain is. I took a magnet and ran it over my hand and it started to hurt worse. I don't know if it is a coincidence or in my head but even as I am typing this it is hurting. I tried to take pics but they did not come out well. It doesn't show anything really, but I did put arrows on the pics to show te source of the pain. So I have no idea if it is from an abduction or not.
